title: 81st Annual Columbus Day Parade
description: A parade celebrating Columbus Day along Fifth Avenue from 44th Street to 72nd Street.
address: Fifth Avenue from 44th Street to 72nd Street

title: 10th Annual Diwali Times Square
description: A celebration of Diwali on Broadway from 46th St to 48th St.

title: 10th Annual Indigenous Peoples Day
description: A celebration of Indigenous Peoples Day on Randall’s Island.

title: Kings County Fiber Festival
description: A festival celebrating fiber arts at the grounds of the Old Stone House in Washington Park. Rain date is 10/25.
address: The Old Stone House, Washington Park

title: Astoria Park Alliance’s Fourth Annual Classic Car Show
description: Classic car show along Shore Boulevard in Astoria Park.

title: The Annual New York Queer Zine Fair
description: A fair celebrating queer zines at the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual + Transgender Community Center in Greenwich Village.
address: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual + Transgender Community Center, Greenwich Village

title: Smorgasburg Diwali: Festival of Bites
description: A food festival celebrating Diwali at Marsha P. Johnson State Park in Williamsburg on Saturday and Breeze Hill in Prospect Park on Sunday.
address: Marsha P. Johnson State Park, Williamsburg / Breeze Hill, Prospect Park

title: Metropolitan Postcard Club Show + Sale
description: Cultural event featuring a show and sale of postcards at the Church of the Village in Greenwich Village. Admission is $7.
address: Church of the Village, Greenwich Village

title: Green-Wood After Hours
description: Explore Green-Wood Cemetery under the night sky with stories of notable New Yorkers. BYO flashlight.

title: Vocabaret: ‘Pumpkin Spice’ Edition
description: A monthly variety show for language lovers featuring wordplay and entertainment.

title: Deadly Crush: A Childhood Ruining Erotic Horror Film
description: A screening of the terrible erotic horror movie 'Deadly Crush' with a pre-show presentation.

title: Boyz in the Woods Comedy
description: A standup-meets-trivia show where audience members can win free drinks by answering trivia questions.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced and hosted comedy show featuring various performers.
cost: Free (tip jar will be passed around)

title: Drop Up Video
description: A panel of comedians riff on music videos that we love to hate.

title: Party Like It’s 1999: No Doubt, It’s Gwen Edition
description: A dance party celebrating the 30th anniversary of No Doubt’s 'Tragic Kingdom' with DJ Steve Reynolds.
